alert.note: Alert for Beauregard; Northern Calcasieu; Southern Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 5:44PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Beauregard, northwestern Calcasieu Parishes in southwestern Louisiana and south central Newton Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 544 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Bivens to near Lunita to near Buhler. Movement was southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vinton, Fields, De Quincy, Starks, Lunita, Bivens, Buhler, Bancroft and Edgerly. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 9 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
